audio.description: Defines or calls an audio object

music.description: Defines or calls a 'music' type audio object

song.description: Defines or calls a 'song' type music object

sound.description: Defines or calls a 'sound effect' type audio object

ambience.description: Defines or calls an 'ambience' type audio object

type.description: Inserts a block with type and audio statements

music object.description: Declares a callable 'music' type audio object

song object.description: Declares a callable 'song' type music object

sound object.description: Declares a callable 'sound effect' type audio object

ambience object.description: Declares a callable 'ambience' type audio object
